hero.title: TapCar
hero.description: Private Car Sharing Application for Smart Vehicles
hero.tagline: A revolutionary peer-to-peer car sharing platform that decouples car usage from ownership, focusing on trust-based sharing within small groups of family, friends, and colleagues.

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: TapCar represents a paradigm shift in mobility, moving beyond traditional car rental to create a trust-based car sharing ecosystem. As the React Native developer, I built the entire mobile application that integrates directly with vehicle telematics and external systems.
overview.funding: Supported by Research Council of Norway

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Traditional car sharing solutions focus on rental models with third-party telematics that require expensive installations. TapCar needed to create a fundamentally different approach based on trust and seamless integration with modern vehicles.

problems.title: Third-Party Telematics Dependencies
problems.description: Existing solutions require costly dongles and complex installations

problems.title: Lack of Trust in Car Sharing
problems.description: Traditional platforms don't foster genuine sharing relationships

problems.title: Complex Vehicle Integration
problems.description: Direct OEM integration requires sophisticated technical solutions

problems.title: Fair Pricing Challenges
problems.description: Transparent and equitable cost allocation for all parties

solution.title: Innovative Solution
solution.description: I developed a comprehensive React Native application that revolutionizes car sharing through direct OEM integration, proprietary algorithms, and trust-based user relationships.

features.title: Zero Third-Party Telematics
features.description: Direct integration with embedded OEM telematic hardware eliminates need for dongles or installations.

features.title: Trust-Based Sharing Groups
features.description: Enable car owners to share vehicles with select groups of trusted individuals - family, friends, and colleagues.

features.title: Smart Cost Allocation
features.description: Proprietary algorithms automatically calculate fair pricing and distribute costs including tolls and usage fees.

features.title: Mission-Critical Reliability
features.description: Custom BLE device developed with SINTEF provides ultra-high reliability for critical use cases.
